revised_title: Acoustic Properties of Elastic Panels: Resonant and Non-Resonant Radiation
tldr: This study investigates the resonant and non-resonant acoustic properties of elastic panels, focusing on the radiation problem. The research calculates the power flow from the panels, considering mechanical excitation and accounting for both resonance and non-resonance contributions. The findings provide an improved and unified theory for the acoustic radiation from plates, with implications for applications in acoustic engineering and helicopter internal noise reduction.
